app_header: Bring all of your work under one roof for your entire team to collaborate on.
agreement_text: By signing up, I agree to the WorkAssist
welcomeDesc: You’re just one click away from supercharging your productivity!
selectAccountDesc: You can also set a default account to skip this screen
signUpBottomText: You are signing up with {{email}}. Wrong account?
welcomeMessage: Welcome to WorkAssist! Now let's personalize things for you with a few short questions.
empty_cnfpwd_msz: Conform password should not be empty
pwd_cnfpwd_msz: Password and conform password should be same
empty_name_msz: Full name should not be empty
fullname_valid_msz: Full name should be first name & last name
findAndJoin: Find and join your teammates using WorkAssist
chooseAccount: You can choose an account or create a new one.
whatIsExpertise: What is your area of expertise?
thisWillHelp: This will help us personalise your experience and you you a head start
giveYoutAccountDesc: Make it descriptive so your colleagues can find your account easily and understand its purpose.
startInviting: Start by inviting your teammates you want to collaborate with
addThemLater: You can also add them later too
allowKoreUsers: Allow anyone with a @kore.com email to join this account
welcome_message: The 30 hour WorkAssist trial gives you access to all the features that ease your work life. Even if your trial ends, we have got to covered with a lifetime of free features with our Basic plan.
request_submitted: We have submitted your request to join the account, “Operations”. We will inform you when it is approved by the admin.
title: Hello and Welcome, Kora sample app is ready to use

alt-text.person: Illustration of a person opening the gate.

login.title: <0>More</0> than just your <2>assistant</2>.

login.g-suite: The login seems to be a GSuite user, please click on the Sign in button to login using Google.
login.o-365: The login seems to be a Office 365 user, please click on the Sign in button to login using Office 365.
